name: Labyrinth Of Death (itch)
description:
Labyrinth of Death is a survival horror dungeon crawler.

You control a man trying to escape a wicked mansion. To move used the WASD keys or the buttons on the screen.

You can pick up items by left-clicking them, adding them to your inventory. You can use items by right-clicking them in your inventory. Certain items can also be combined by being dragged onto one another.

The mansion features many puzzles, with interactables that can be left-clicked on in the game view.

In safe rooms, you can store items in a box and have another surprise...
